page.title: 04INDUSTRY
page.content: Industry is mainly {tertiary}with some secondary industries.The tertiary industries provide the people with direct services such as information bureaux,libraries,banks,schools,post offices entertainment centres etc. The few secondary industries mainly consist of small private builders. The majority of builders are male because the work is very strenuous. They wear overalls because the work is very messy.The average day's work is from{9.00 a.m. to 5.00 p.m.}with an hours break at mid-day for lunch. Wages are usually paid in cash at the end of each week or month.
